title: Castle In The Darkness v1.0.6
description:
Castle in the Darkness v1.0.6



Another Princess Needs Saving!

The kingdom of Alexandria had slept peacfully for many years, free of wars and menace. But on the third full moon, fifty years after the king's victory over an ancient evil, the kingdom is attacked by a legion of evil monsters once again. The princess is kidnapped by an evil sorceror, and it's your duty as a royal knight to return her to the castle safely!

Castle In The Darkness is a retro-styled exploration platformer that blends the challenging-yet-rewarding gameplay concepts of classic NES games (like Megaman, Metroid, Castlevania etc.) with modern tight controls and fast play!

Key Features

An open-ended game world for you to explore!
Hundreds of enemies and bosses to defeat!
Many items to collect that will strengthen you and help you win!
Popular references that will amuse you (and probably also be dangerous)!
An awesome soundtrack of 8-bit melodic rock!
Tons of hidden secrets to find!
Extra game modes!
All the above and more for the (cheap) price of most games' DLC!


V 1.06

- Fixed the Torture Chambers black screen bug
- Fixed a bug that made frog cutscenes replay over and over again
- Skipping frog cutscenes now triggers the same value as watching the full cutscene
- 'Cyclops' boss hitbox adjustments
- 'Rock Golem' boss hitbox adjustments
- 'Rock Golem' slam and 'Gumhead' now remove the Crystal Heart in NG+
- 'Apprentice' enemy magic sound effect is now governed by the SFX volume option
- Fixed an out of bounds room in the House of Ruth
- Fixed an out of bounds room in the 100-Year-Old-Man's House
- Removed a keyboard shortcut that replenished 'X' boss' health
- Fixed missing blocks in the cave of "Prologue...?" mode
- Made 'Frost Ape' boss invulnerable to attacks while frozen
